title: Health Bar is positioned lowered on some champs.
body: Look at this its really annoying, i cant see anything when I need to click on enemy champions that are glitched.

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up (and for adding screenshots!)
so u reply to this but not everyone else who is asking for help about the servers being attacked u haven't even mentioned it

Hey there! 

We're aware of the issue at hand, and I can guarantee you the team is working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible! Unfortunately, I'm not on the team that handles these types of issues, so I'm not qualified to give you information on the issue. You can keep up to date with what the status of things are by visiting the sever status site: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na. 

I work on the skins team, and something like health bars being incorrectly positioned is something I can speak to and handle a bit better. :]

Hope that clears things up!
Thanks for fixing the problem riot i was kind of mean on my first comment because league is like my life
No worries, it's really cool that you're so passionate! Just wanted to clarify! :]

> Thanks for the heads up (and for adding screenshots!)

Also this happens with {{champion:58}} and is much worse (i think they cut his model in half and it stuck behind the bar entirely). They are annoying hard to click on, even with smart cast/attack move.
